timeline.bodyText: Should this maybe be version and not v9 specifically?
timeline.author: jdekonin

replies.bodyText: Actually why not just have this all under the same section?
replies.author: jdekonin

replies.bodyText: Could. If version changed it would be less updating. If we end up with more than 1 version it would be harder to identify. But I doubt we'd use more than 1 version. I'll update.
replies.author: AdamBrousseau

replies.bodyText: Windows uses cuda but with a different location. p/x linux share the same location.
replies.author: AdamBrousseau

timeline.message:
Remove JDK13 from Pipelines

- Also cleanup variable file. Add defs for
  cuda, cuda_9 and openssl bundling.
- Update Windows to use standard repo cache
  location. The Updater job is already populating
  the default one so the cygdrive one is becoming
  out of date.

[skip ci]

Signed-off-by: Adam Brousseau <adam.brousseau88@gmail.com>

Remove JDK13 from Pipelines

- Also cleanup variable file. Add defs for
  cuda, cuda_9 and openssl bundling.
- Update Windows to use standard repo cache
  location. The Updater job is already populating
  the default one so the cygdrive one is becoming
  out of date.

[skip ci]

Signed-off-by: Adam Brousseau <adam.brousseau88@gmail.com>
